00040 //----------------------------------------------------------
00041 GrRenderLight::GrRenderLight( GrStreamingIB* streamingIB, unsigned int maxIndexBatchSize )
00042 : _renderShadow( streamingIB, maxIndexBatchSize )
00043 , _streamingIB( streamingIB )
00044 , _maxIndexBatchSize( maxIndexBatchSize )
00045 , _wireframe( false )
00046 , _colorTextureEnable( true )
00047 {
00049         _white = gGrTextureMgr->FindTexture( GR_SYSTEX_WHITE );
00050 
00052         _normalizeCube = gGrTextureMgr->FindTexture( GR_SYSTEXCUBE_NORMALIZE );
00053 
00055         _cubeLookupX = gGrTextureMgr->FindTexture( GR_SYSTEX_CUBE_X );
00056 
00058         _cubeLookupY = gGrTextureMgr->FindTexture( GR_SYSTEX_CUBE_Y );
00059 
00061         _black = gGrTextureMgr->FindTexture( GR_SYSTEX_BLACK );
00062 
00064         _defaultBump = gGrTextureMgr->FindTexture( GR_SYSTEX_GRAY );
00065 
00067         _defaultNormal = gGrTextureMgr->FindTexture( GR_SYSTEX_NORMAL );
00068 
00070         _jitterVolume = gGrTextureMgr->FindTexture( GR_SYSTEX3D_JITTER );
00071 
00073         _noShadow = gGrTextureMgr->FindTexture( GR_SYSTEX_DEPTH );
00074 }

00087 //----------------------------------------------------------
00088 void
00089 GrRenderLight::RenderLight( const GrRenderList& lightReceivers, const GrRenderList& shadowCasters,
00090                                                         const GrCamera& camera, const GrLight& light, unsigned int time, EGRQUALITY quality )
00091 {
00093         shadowCasters.Sort( SortCmp );
00094         lightReceivers.Sort( SortCmp );
00095 
00098         GrLight adjustedLight = light;
00099         if ( adjustedLight.GetGlobal() )
00100                 adjustedLight.SetParentTransform( MMat4x4( camera.GetPos() ) );
00101 
00103         URef< GrTextureBase > shadow;
00104         GrVirtualShadowPage::SRenderData shadowData;
00105         if ( adjustedLight.CastShadow() )
00106         {
00107                 shadow = _renderShadow.RenderShadow( shadowData, shadowCasters, camera, adjustedLight, time, quality );
00108         }
00109         else
00110         {
00111                 shadow = _noShadow;
00112                 shadowData = _renderShadow.GetNoShadowData();
00113         }
00114 
00116         CHECK_GL();
00117 
00120         URef< GrTextureBase > projTex = adjustedLight.GetProjTexture();
00121         if ( !projTex )
00122                 projTex = _white;
00123 
00125         const float kLightRange = adjustedLight.GetCachedRange();
00126         const MVec3 kWorldLightPos = adjustedLight.GetPos();
00127         bool kLightParallel = adjustedLight.IsParallel();
00128         const MVec3& kWorldCameraPos = camera.GetPos();
00129         const GrColor& kLightColor = adjustedLight.GetCachedColor();
00130         const float kShadowWidth = adjustedLight.GetWidth() / Max( adjustedLight.GetProjection().GetWidth(), adjustedLight.GetProjection().GetHeight() );
00131         const float kShadowWidthParams[ 4 ] = { kShadowWidth, kShadowWidth, -kShadowWidth, 0.0f };
00132         const float kLightHaze[ 4 ] = { adjustedLight.GetHaziness(), 1.0f - adjustedLight.GetHaziness(), 0.0f, 0.0f };
00133         const float kLightFalloff[ 4 ] = { adjustedLight.GetSqrAtten(), adjustedLight.GetLinAtten(), 0.0f, adjustedLight.GetConstAtten() };
00134         const float kLightRangeParams[ 4 ] = { kLightRange, kLightRange, kLightRange, 1.0f / kLightRange };
00135         const MMat4x4& kProjTexGenMatrix = adjustedLight.GetTexGenMatrix();
00136         float kRadialDirMask = kLightParallel ? 0.0f : 1.0f;
00137         float kInvRadialDirMask = kLightParallel ? 1.0f : 0.0f;
00138         const MVec3 kWorldLightDir = kInvRadialDirMask * adjustedLight.GetDir();
00139         const float kWorldLightDirOverride[ 4 ] = { kWorldLightDir.GetX(), kWorldLightDir.GetY(), kWorldLightDir.GetZ(), kRadialDirMask };
00140         const float shadowNearD = ( adjustedLight.IsParallel() || ( adjustedLight.GetProjection().IsOrtho() && adjustedLight.GetProjTexture() != 0 ) ) ? 0.0f : adjustedLight.GetProjection().GetNearClip().GetD();
00141         const float kShadowNearClip[ 4 ] = { shadowNearD, shadowNearD, shadowNearD, shadowNearD };
00142 
00144         GrSetState( GR_DEPTHTEST | ( _wireframe ? GR_WIREFRAME : 0 ) );
00145         GrSetWriteEnable( GR_RGBA );
00146         GrSetDepthMode( EDM_EQUAL );
00147 
00149         _normalizeCube->Bind( GR_TEX_CUBE_NORMALIZE, GL_LINEAR, GL_LINEAR, GL_CLAMP_TO_EDGE, GL_CLAMP_TO_EDGE );
00150         _cubeLookupX->Bind( GR_TEX_CUBE_FACE_X, GL_NEAREST, GL_NEAREST, GL_CLAMP_TO_EDGE, GL_CLAMP_TO_EDGE );
00151         _cubeLookupY->Bind( GR_TEX_CUBE_FACE_Y, GL_NEAREST, GL_NEAREST, GL_CLAMP_TO_EDGE, GL_CLAMP_TO_EDGE );
00152         _jitterVolume->Bind( GR_TEX_JITTER, GL_NEAREST, GL_NEAREST, GL_REPEAT, GL_REPEAT );
00153         projTex->Bind( GR_TEX_PROJECTION, GL_LINEAR, GL_LINEAR, GL_CLAMP_TO_BORDER, GL_CLAMP_TO_BORDER );
00154 
00156         shadowData.indirCube->Bind( GR_TEX_SHADOW_VSM_CUBE, GL_NEAREST, GL_NEAREST, GL_CLAMP_TO_EDGE, GL_CLAMP_TO_EDGE );
00157 
00159         if ( !_colorTextureEnable )
00160         {
00161                 _defaultBump->Bind( GR_TEX_BUMP );
00162                 _white->Bind( GR_TEX_DIFFUSE );
00163                 _black->Bind( GR_TEX_SPECULAR );
00164                 _defaultNormal->Bind( GR_TEX_NORMAL );
00165         }
00166 
00168         GrTextureBase* curShadowTex = 0;
00169         GrShader* prevShader = 0;
00170         EGRQUALITY masterQuality = quality;
00171         bool shaderChanged = false;
00172 
00174         unsigned int objCount = lightReceivers.GetItemCount();
00175         unsigned int startObj = 0;
00176         while ( startObj < objCount )
00177         {
00179                 unsigned int endObj = 0;
00180                 const GrMaterial* material = GetMaterialSpan( endObj, lightReceivers, startObj );
00181 
00183                 if ( material->GetSortType() == GrMaterial::EST_DECAL )
00184                         GrSetDepthMode( EDM_LESSEQUAL );
00185                 else
00186                         GrSetDepthMode( EDM_EQUAL );
00187 
00189                 bool materialReceiveShadow = material->GetReceiveShadow();
00190 
00192                 const unsigned int passCount = material->GetPassCount();
00193                 for ( unsigned int pass = 0; pass < passCount; ++pass )
00194                 {
00196                         const GrMaterialPass* curPass = material->GetPass( pass );
00197 
00199                         EGRQUALITY passQuality = curPass->ReceiveShadow() ? masterQuality : EGQ_LOW;
00200 
00203                         if ( !adjustedLight.GetColor().IsBetween( curPass->GetMinLightResponse(), curPass->GetMaxLightResponse() ) )
00204                                 continue;
00205 
00207                         GrShader* shader = curPass->GetShader();
00208                         B_ASSERT( shader != 0 );
00209                         if ( shader != prevShader )
00210                         {
00211                                 curPass->ApplyShader( passQuality );
00212                                 shader->SetEngineParam4fv( GrShader::EP_LIGHT_COLOR, kLightColor );
00213                                 shader->SetEngineParam4fv( GrShader::EP_LIGHT_ATTEN, kLightFalloff );
00214                                 shader->SetEngineParam4fv( GrShader::EP_LIGHT_HAZE, kLightHaze );
00215                                 shader->SetEngineParam4fv( GrShader::EP_LIGHT_WIDTH, kShadowWidthParams );
00216                                 shader->SetEngineParam4fv( GrShader::EP_SHADOW_NEAR_CLIP, kShadowNearClip );
00217                                 prevShader = shader;
00218                                 shaderChanged = true;
00219                         }
00220                         curPass->GetUserParams().ApplyUserParams();
00221                         curPass->GetUserParams().ApplyUserSamplers();
00222 
00224                         curPass->ApplyStates( ~GR_WIREFRAME, GR_RGBA );
00225                         curPass->ApplyLightBlendStates( ~GR_WIREFRAME );
00226                         curPass->GetTextureSet().ApplyGlobalState( shader );
00227 
00229                         if ( _colorTextureEnable )
00230                         {
00231                                 curPass->GetTextureSet().ApplyStageState( ES_BUMP, GR_TEX_BUMP, shader, GrShader::EP_BUMP_MOD, GrShader::EP_BUMP_ADD );
00232                                 curPass->GetTextureSet().ApplyStageState( ES_NORMAL, GR_TEX_NORMAL );
00233                                 curPass->GetTextureSet().ApplyStageState( ES_DIFFUSE, GR_TEX_DIFFUSE, shader, GrShader::EP_DIFFUSE_MOD, GrShader::EP_DIFFUSE_ADD );
00234                                 curPass->GetTextureSet().ApplyStageState( ES_SPECULAR, GR_TEX_SPECULAR, shader, GrShader::EP_SPECULAR_MOD, GrShader::EP_SPECULAR_ADD );
00235                         }
00236 
00238                         if ( curPass->ReceiveShadow() && materialReceiveShadow )
00239                         {
00240                                 if ( curShadowTex != shadow )
00241                                 {
00242                                         shadow->Bind( GR_TEX_SHADOW, GL_LINEAR, GL_LINEAR, GL_CLAMP_TO_EDGE, GL_CLAMP_TO_EDGE );
00243                                         curShadowTex = shadow;
00244                                 }
00245                         }
00246                         else
00247                         {
00248                                 if ( curShadowTex != _noShadow )
00249                                 {
00250                                         _noShadow->Bind( GR_TEX_SHADOW, GL_LINEAR, GL_LINEAR, GL_CLAMP_TO_EDGE, GL_CLAMP_TO_EDGE );
00251                                         curShadowTex = _noShadow;
00252                                 }
00253                         }
00254 
00256                         bool previousPreTransformed = false;
00257                         for ( unsigned int obj = startObj; obj < endObj; ++obj )
00258                         {
00259                                 const GrRenderList::SItem& renderable = lightReceivers[ obj ];
00260 
00262                                 if ( renderable.preTransformed )
00263                                 {
00265                                         if ( !previousPreTransformed || shaderChanged )
00266                                         {
00267                                                 shader->SetEngineParam4x4fv( GrShader::EP_MODEL_VIEW_PROJECTION_MATRIX, camera.GetViewProjMatrix() );
00268                                                 shader->SetEngineParam4fv( GrShader::EP_LOCAL_VIEW_POSITION, kWorldCameraPos );
00269                                                 shader->SetEngineParam4fv( GrShader::EP_LOCAL_LIGHT_POSITION, kWorldLightPos );
00270                                                 shader->SetEngineParam4fv( GrShader::EP_LOCAL_LIGHT_DIR_OVERRIDE, kWorldLightDirOverride );
00271                                                 shader->SetEngineParam4fv( GrShader::EP_LIGHT_RANGE, kLightRangeParams );
00272                                                 shader->SetEngineParam4x4fv( GrShader::EP_LIGHT_PROJECTION_MATRIX, kProjTexGenMatrix.GetDataStart() );
00273                                                 shader->SetEngineParam4x4fv( GrShader::EP_SHADOW_PROJECTION_MATRIX, shadowData.shadowMatrix );
00274                                                 previousPreTransformed = true;
00275                                                 shaderChanged = false;
00276                                         }
00277 
00279                                         if ( renderable.meshInst->GetMesh()->GetRange( renderable.range ).count < _maxIndexBatchSize )
00280                                                 obj = BatchRender( lightReceivers, obj, endObj, LIGHT_VERTEX_COMPONENTS, time );
00281                                         else
00282                                                 renderable.meshInst->RenderRange( renderable.range, LIGHT_VERTEX_COMPONENTS, time );
00283                                 }
00284                                 else
00285                                 {
00286                                         previousPreTransformed = false;
00287 
00289                                         const MMat4x4& world = renderable.meshInst->GetTransform();
00290                                         const MMat4x4& invWorld = renderable.meshInst->GetInvTransform();
00291                                         const MMat3x3& invWorldRotate = renderable.meshInst->GetInvTransposeRot();
00292                                         MVec3 worldPos;
00293                                         MVec3 worldScales;
00294                                         world.GetTranslate( worldPos );
00295                                         world.GetScale( worldScales );
00296                                         float worldScale = worldScales.Max();
00297                                         float invWorldScale = 1.0f / worldScales.Max();
00298 
00299                                         MVec3 localEyePos = invWorld.TransformCoord( kWorldCameraPos );
00300                                         MVec3 localLightPos = invWorld.TransformCoord( kWorldLightPos );
00301                                         MVec3 localLightDir = invWorldRotate.RotatePoint( kWorldLightDir );
00302                                         MMat4x4 localProjTexgen = kProjTexGenMatrix * world;
00303                                         MMat4x4 localShadowTexgen = shadowData.shadowMatrix * world;
00304 
00305                                         const float kLocalLightDirOverride[ 4 ] = {
00306                                                 ( 1.0f - kRadialDirMask ) * localLightDir.GetX(),
00307                                                 ( 1.0f - kRadialDirMask ) * localLightDir.GetY(),
00308                                                 ( 1.0f - kRadialDirMask ) * localLightDir.GetZ(),
00309                                                 kRadialDirMask
00310                                         };
00311 
00313                                         float localLightRangeParams[ 4 ] = {
00314                                                 invWorldScale * kLightRangeParams[ 0 ],
00315                                                 invWorldScale * kLightRangeParams[ 1 ],
00316                                                 invWorldScale * kLightRangeParams[ 2 ],
00317                                                 worldScale * kLightRangeParams[ 3 ],
00318                                         };
00319 
00320                                         shader->SetEngineParam4x4fv( GrShader::EP_MODEL_VIEW_PROJECTION_MATRIX, camera.GetViewProjMatrix() * world );
00321                                         shader->SetEngineParam4fv( GrShader::EP_LOCAL_VIEW_POSITION, localEyePos );
00322                                         shader->SetEngineParam4fv( GrShader::EP_LOCAL_LIGHT_POSITION, localLightPos );
00323                                         shader->SetEngineParam4fv( GrShader::EP_LOCAL_LIGHT_DIR_OVERRIDE, kLocalLightDirOverride );
00324                                         shader->SetEngineParam4fv( GrShader::EP_LIGHT_RANGE, localLightRangeParams );
00325                                         shader->SetEngineParam4x4fv( GrShader::EP_LIGHT_PROJECTION_MATRIX, localProjTexgen.GetDataStart() );
00326                                         shader->SetEngineParam4x4fv( GrShader::EP_SHADOW_PROJECTION_MATRIX, localShadowTexgen.GetDataStart() );
00327 
00329                                         renderable.meshInst->RenderRange( renderable.range, LIGHT_VERTEX_COMPONENTS, time );
00330                                 }
00331                         }
00332                 }
00333                 startObj = endObj;
00334         }
00335 }

00342 //----------------------------------------------------------
00343 const GrMaterial*
00344 GrRenderLight::GetMaterialSpan( unsigned int& spanEnd, const GrRenderList& list, unsigned int startObj )
00345 {
00346         B_ASSERT( startObj < list.GetItemCount() );
00347         const GrMaterial* curMaterial = list[ startObj ].meshInst->GetMaterial( list[ startObj ].range );
00348         spanEnd = startObj+1;
00349         while ( spanEnd < list.GetItemCount() && curMaterial == list[ spanEnd ].meshInst->GetMaterial( list[ spanEnd ].range ) )
00350                 ++spanEnd;
00351         return curMaterial;
00352 }
00353 
00354 //----------------------------------------------------------
00355 unsigned int
00356 GrRenderLight::BatchRender( const GrRenderList& renderableArray, unsigned int startIdx, unsigned int endIdx,
00357                                                         unsigned int vertexComponents, unsigned int time )
00358 {
00361         B_ASSERT( renderableArray[ startIdx ].preTransformed );
00362         B_ASSERT( renderableArray[ startIdx ].meshInst->GetSkinInst() == 0 );
00363         B_ASSERT( renderableArray[ startIdx ].meshInst->GetMesh()->GetIndexData() != 0 );
00364 
00366         B_ASSERT( renderableArray[ startIdx ].meshInst->GetMesh()->GetRange( renderableArray[ startIdx ].range ).count < _maxIndexBatchSize )
00367 
00369         URef< GrMesh > mesh = renderableArray[ startIdx ].meshInst->GetMesh();
00370         unsigned int minIndex = 0xFFFF;
00371         unsigned int maxIndex = 0;
00372         unsigned int count = 0;
00373 
00375         _streamingIB->Bind();
00376         unsigned int offset = _streamingIB->GetOffset();
00377 
00380         do
00381         {
00383                 const GrRenderList::SItem& curRenderable = renderableArray[ startIdx ];
00384 
00386                 if ( ( count + mesh->GetRange( curRenderable.range ).count ) > _maxIndexBatchSize )
00387                         break;
00388 
00390                 count += curRenderable.meshInst->BatchRange( *_streamingIB, curRenderable.range, time );
00391 
00393                 minIndex = Min( mesh->GetRange( curRenderable.range ).minIndex, minIndex );
00394                 maxIndex = Max( mesh->GetRange( curRenderable.range ).maxIndex, maxIndex );
00395 
00397                 ++startIdx;
00398         }
00399         while (
00400                 startIdx < endIdx &&
00401                 renderableArray[ startIdx ].preTransformed &&
00402                 renderableArray[ startIdx ].meshInst->GetMesh() == mesh
00403                 );
00404 
00406         CHECK_GL();
00407 
00409         mesh->GetVertexData()->Bind( vertexComponents );
00410         CHECK_GL();
00411 
00413         bglDrawRangeElements( 
00414                 GL_TRIANGLES,
00415                 minIndex,
00416                 maxIndex,
00417                 count,
00418                 GL_UNSIGNED_SHORT,
00419                 ( ( unsigned short* )0 ) + offset );
00420         CHECK_GL();
00421 
00423         return startIdx-1;
00424 }
00425 
00426 //----------------------------------------------------------
00427 bool
00428 GrRenderLight::SortCmp( const GrRenderList::SItem& left, const GrRenderList::SItem& right )
00429 {
00431         const GrMaterial* leftMat = left.meshInst->GetMaterial( left.range );
00432         const GrMaterial* rightMat = right.meshInst->GetMaterial( right.range );
00433         B_ASSERT( leftMat != 0 && rightMat != 0 );
00434 
00436         if ( leftMat->GetSortType() != rightMat->GetSortType() )
00437                 return leftMat->GetSortType() < rightMat->GetSortType();
00438 
00440         return ( size_t )leftMat < ( size_t )rightMat;  
00441 }
